entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
